thread.title: BRIEF-China Vanguard You Champion Says Sinopharm Health Cross Border E-Commerce Co Enters Purchase Deal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Vanguard You Champion Says Sinopharm Health Cross Border E-Commerce Co Enters Purchase Deal

organizations.name: brief-china vanguard you champion says sinopharm health cross border e-commerce co
reuters) - china vanguard you champion holdings ltd

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - China Vanguard You Champion Holdings Ltd :
* SINOPHARM HEALTH CROSS BORDER E-COMMERCE CO ENTERS PURCHASE DEAL WITH LUNG FUNG PHARMACEUTICAL (GROUP) LTD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
